definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: They both had large eyes, wide foreheads and tapering muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆的大眼睛，寬闊的前額和尖細槍口。

sentences.english: She likes to use pencils with fine points, I don't.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡用筆頭尖細的鉛筆，我不喜歡。

sentences.english: A thin fragile edge, especially a tapering edge of a board.
sentences.chinese: 十分薄而易碎的邊緣，尤指木板尖細的邊緣。

sentences.english: The tang is usually found only on tapered shank tools.
sentences.chinese: 柄舌通常是在涿漸尖細的柄工具上找到的。

sentences.english: One end of a pencil is tapered off to a point.
sentences.chinese: 鉛筆的一端逐漸尖細成一尖頭。

sentences.english: Now I will to taper the bottom of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 現在我將使心的底部逐漸尖細。

sentences.english: He listens a roar wITe otITs listen only a squeak.
sentences.chinese: 他聽到的一聲大吼對於更多有聯繫人只是尖細的叫喚。

sentences.english: He hears a roar where others hear only a squeak.
sentences.chinese: 他聽到的一聲大吼對於別人只是尖細的叫喚。
